Detailed Description

Class for holding multiple layers of one octave.

The SFOP scale space is devided into octaves, each having the same number of layers and being computed from a downsampled version of the original image. Every octave has have the resolution of its predecessor.

[in]f_octaveIndex of this octave
[in]f_numLayersNumber of scales in this octave
[in]f_typeType of features to be detected (positive angle in degrees or -1 for "optimal")
